attributes.action: Block any attempt to give Tony Blair a Knighthood or Peerage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Tony Blair departs there will be those who wish to nominate him and or his wife for higher office, the incoming Prime Minister should block any such request until such time as all British Forces have been returned from both Iraq and Afghanistan, with peace having been restored, he should not be permitted to walk away from this disaster and then be rewarded for it!!
